name: Gem Trek Publishing Canadian Rockies Map 12th Edition
description: This popular map is a must-have for anyone planning a trip to Banff, Jasper, Yoho or Kootenay National Park in the Canadian Rockies. Includes 29 points of interest, street maps for towns, amenities, and a mileage chart to help you get around. Also includes lodges, campgrounds, hot springs, golf courses, ski areas, picnic areas, visitor centres and highway viewpoints.
